Settings.name: Background Video Filter
Settings.update_function: async function () { return `#NewtubeBlurBG { filter: contrast(${await Load('NVDOC')}) brightness(${await Load('NVDOBGT')}); }`; }

Settings.name: Video Size
Settings.update_function: async function () { return `#NewtubeCanvasWraper { transform: scale(${await Load('NVDOT')}); }`; }
